        <description>Implementation for OAuth Bearer token Authorization</description>
        <name>BearerAuth</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var BearerAuth = Class.create();

BearerAuth.prototype = {
   initialize : function(request, response, auth_type, auth_value) {
      this.request = request;
      this.response = response;
      this.auth_type = auth_type;
      this.auth_value = auth_value;
	     gs.log("Bearer auth " + this.auth_type);
   },
   
   getAuthorized : function() {
	   gs.log("----------------------- Bearer Auth -----------------------------");
	  var result = GlideUser.authenticateOAuthAccessToken(this.auth_value);      
      if (!result) {
         return null;
      }
      
	  // user is authenticated, so return it...
      return result;
   }
}]]></script>
